front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks--Bridge Port Extension
front.abstract: This standard specifies the operation of Bridge Port Extenders, including management, protocols, and algorithms. Bridge Port Extenders operate in support of the MAC Service by Extended Bridges. The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the GETIEEE802 program located at http://standards.ieee.org/about/get/802/
